Title: Quibbler - Universal News Reader
Description:
Quibbler is a product designed and developed by Indigo Architects. 
Quibbler is a desktop application which runs on user's machine and provides a intuitive user interface for reading news in offline mode.
Quibbler is developed in WPF (.Net 3.5).
